article.title: SAIC Awarded $21 Million DISA ENCORE II Task Order
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a prime task order by the Defense Information Systems Agency (DISA) Defense Information Technology Contracting Organization to provide information assurance training support to the U.S. Defense Department. The contract has a value of more than $21 million if all options are exercised.
